value.title: Bright Machines
value.excerpt: We deliver intelligent, software-defined manufacturing by bringing together our flexible factory robots with intelligent software, production data and machine learning. Our growing, global team of more than 300 robotics, software and manufacturing industry veterans believe building physical things should be as seamless and simple as creating digital products. Our software-defined manufacturing platform helps customers innovate faster to meet the growing demands of a new era of manufacturing.

value.title: Feedzai
value.excerpt: Feedzai is AI. We‚Äôre coding the future of commerce with a leading platform powered by artificial intelligence and big data. Founded and developed by data scientists and aerospace engineers, Feedzai has one critical mission: make commerce safe. The world‚Äôs largest banks, payment providers and retailers use Feedzai‚Äôs machine learning technology to manage risks associated with banking and shopping, whether it‚Äôs in person, online or via mobile devices.

value.title: Icertis
value.excerpt: Icertis, the leading enterprise contract management platform in the cloud, solves the hardest contract management problems on the easiest to use platform. With Icertis, companies accelerate their business by increasing contract velocity, protect against risk by ensuring regulatory and policy compliance, and optimize their commercial relationships by maximizing revenue and reducing costs. The AI-infused Icertis Contract Management (ICM) platform is used by companies like 3M, Airbus, Cognizant, Daimler, Microsoft and Sanofi to manage 6.5 million contracts in 40+ languages across 90+ countries.

value.title: Infermedica
value.excerpt: Founded in 2012 by a team of engineers, data scientists, and physicians, Infermedica develops its own AI engine to collect intake, check symptoms, and guide patients to the right care.

value.title: Invoca
value.excerpt: Invoca is an AI-powered call tracking and conversational analytics company that brings the depth of marketing analytics traditionally limited to digital consumer interactions to the world of human-to-human selling. With Invoca, marketers can use real-time call and conversational analytics to maximize the return of their paid media campaigns in Google and Facebook, and improve the buying experience by enriching customer profiles in Salesforce and Adobe Experience Cloud. With Fortune 500 customers and deep partnerships with the technologies marketers use every day, Invoca has raised $116M from leading venture capitalists including Accel, Upfront Ventures, H.I.G. Growth Partners, Morgan Stanley, and Salesforce Ventures. For more information, visit www.invoca.com.

value.title: Liulishuo
value.excerpt: Founded by Yi Wang, Hui Lin and Ben Hu in 2012, Liulishuo is the world's leading "AI + Education"‚Äã company. The Company has developed the world's first ‚ÄúAI English Teacher‚Äù based on deep learning, which provides a personalized and adaptive learning path for every learner. It is proven to triple the learning efficiency (reduce the required learning time to one third) compared to human teachers by CEFR (Common European Framework of Reference for Language) standards, according to a study using the TOEIC Bridge Test from ETS.

value.title: OrCam Technologies
value.excerpt: OrCam harnesses the power of artificial vision to assist people who are visually impaired. OrCam has created a technologically advanced device unique in its ability to provide visual aid through a discreet wearable platform and simple easy-to-use interface which serves to enhance the daily lives of people with vision loss. OrCam gives independence.

value.title: Wave Computing
value.excerpt: Wave Computing is a VC-backed company that is revolutionizing artificial intelligence. with its dataflow-based chips, systems and software that deliver orders of magnitude performance improvements over legacy architectures. The company‚Äôs vision is to bring deep learning to customers‚Äô data wherever it may be‚Äîfrom the edge to the data center‚Äîhelping accelerate time-to-insight. Based in Campbell, CA, Wave Computing has been named Frost & Sullivan‚Äôs 2018 ‚ÄúMachine Learning Industry Technology Innovation Leader,‚Äù and recognized by CIO Application Magazine‚Äôs as one of the ‚ÄúTop 25 Artificial Intelligence Providers.‚Äù Combined with MIPS, Wave now has over 400 granted and pending patents and hundreds of customers worldwide.
